title: FS: Scrapbook page Cobb Green, Cobb Bat off
author: jggames

posts.post_title: FS: Scrapbook page Cobb Green, Cobb Bat off
posts.post_content: Looking for a new home for this guy. It's the front and back cover of a Scrapbook that has been sold several times in various states through a couple different auction houses. It looks like people have attempted to remove the page from the backing board, as it is coming apart. Please see pics for details and I'm happy to answer any questions. I'm looking for SOLD
Very interested ! Pm me if still available :)
